pr_title: Add an additional abstraction layer for goal-based operation runnables.

timeline.author: kidkun

timeline.bodyText: why DemoteBrokerRunnable does not extends from this new abstraction?
timeline.author: kidkun

replies.bodyText: This is preserving the abstraction that DemoteBrokerParameters does not extend from GoalBasedOptimizationParameters. The key reason is that the demote operation relies on a single hard-coded goal rather than using a variable goals for execution.
replies.author: efeg

timeline.message: Add an additional abstraction layer for goal-based operation runnables.
